sentence.Network_en: Arachnida and Cecidomyidae had a higher relative abundance than other families being 0.3465 and 0.2309, respectively.
sentence.Network_cn: 蜘蛛类的相对丰盛度最高,为0.3465,瘿蚊科的相对丰盛度为0.2309, 二者在群落中所占比例较高.

sentence.Network_en: On the Identity of the Wheat Midge in China , Sitodiplosis Mosellana ( G é hin ), with Remarks on its Life History ( Diptera, Cecidomyidae )
sentence.Network_cn: 小麦吸浆虫Sitodiplosismosellana ( Gé hin ) 的鉴别同生活习性述要 ( 双翅目 、 瘿蝇科 )

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
